_header: In a summer season when soft was the sun
Note: Includes ‘A’ Texts formerly listed under 1458; for ‘B’ and ‘C’ Texts, see 2459 and 2460; for former 745, see Cambridge UK, Gonville & Caius College 669/646 copy of 2460.
Subjects: dream visions; sins, deadly; prayers, asked on behalf of scribes; scribes; penitence
_description: William Langland, Vision of Piers Plowman, the ‘A’ text

BodAsh1468III.First Lines:
He [ ] for us [ ]ly he deyd for vs alleAnd [ ] yt wrout hym
                    teneBut mekely with mouth Mercy gan secheTo hauyn on þat puple
                    þat pyned hym to dede…
BodAsh1468III.Last Lines:
…Mon persyn with apater noster þe poles of heuynI with
                    oute penauns at here partyng into þe blisse of heuyn

BodDig145.First Lines:
In a somer season whan soft was the soneI schope me into schrubbes
                    as I a schepe were…
BodDig145.Last Lines:
…And send me happe & heale til I haue pers plowmanAnd sith
                    I grad after grace til I gan awake
BodDig145.Note:
‘A’ Text, Prologue to XI; then ‘C’ Text,
                    XII.297-XXIII.
BodDig145.Attributed Title: Primus passus de visione Petri ploughman (f. 2)

BodDou323.First Lines:
In a somer sesoun whan softe was the sonneI schope me to schrondes
                    as I a Schep were…
BodDou323.Last Lines:
…Percen with a pater noster þe paleys of heueneWith oute
                    penaunce at here partyng in to heye blysseNow of þis litel book y haue
                    makyd an endeGoddis blessyng mote he haue þat drinke wil me
                    sende
BodDou323.Note:
‘A’ Text, Prologue to XI; with scribe’s note at
                    ending, f. 140.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN A somer sesun whon softe was þe sonneI schop me in to a
                    schroud A scheep as I were…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Hit is a wel feir lyf quod heo among þe lewed pepleA lyf
                    is I hoten hosebondes hit vsen…
BodEngPoeta1.Note: Imperfect at end: ‘A’ Text, Prologue to XI.180.
